title: Falcon Eye
description: Built a real-time synthetic vision stack for low-visibility flight with game-style 3D awareness on constrained avionics hardware.
ctaText: Learn how Falcon Eye turned simulation-grade visuals into pilot-ready software

title: Spuddie
description: Designed and shipped backend memory systems for an AI companion, improving continuity and relevance across long-running user conversations.
ctaText: See how Spuddie moved from short replies to persistent context

title: Findability Sciences
description: Improved enterprise ML pipelines through data quality analysis and outlier handling, increasing model consistency on noisy business datasets.

title: Venture Shares
description: Built frontend dashboard workflows and shipping-grade internal tools for a market analytics platform in close product and backend collaboration.
